description: New reports give estimated costs of ACA health plans
title: New reports give estimated costs of healthcare reform plans
contentencoded: The health insurance exchanges under the Affordable Care Act open in October. This week some reports are giving new estimates of how much money it will take to get into some of those plans. Marketplace's Adriene Hill reports.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 5, 2013
